investor.name: Shasta Ventures
investor.description: Shasta Ventures is an early-stage venture capital firm with over a billion dollars under management and a 20-year track record in investing in groundbreaking startups. The firm is based in Portola Valley, California, and focuses on investing in enterprise and technology consumer startups.

The firm is based in Portola Valley, California, and focuses on investing in enterprise and technology consumer startups.
